definition[0]: (1961â€“) a US film actor, known for being good looking and sexually attractive. He appeared in the television programme ER from 1994 to 1999. He has been in many films, including Three Kings (1999) and O Brother, Where Art Thou? (2000), and Syriana (2005). He has also written, produced, and directed several films. He is also known for his social and political activism.
